# Manasseh Changachirere

> Software engineer and founder. Founded Nextsoft in 2025, currently working on it, building the next generation of software and infrastructure for Zimbabwe & Africa. Building for Africa, now focused on AI.

This is the personal website and blog of Manasseh Changachirere, a software engineer and founder based in Harare. The site showcases professional experience, technical writings, and open source contributions.

## About

Manasseh is a software engineer and founder. His stack revolves heavily around TypeScript and C#/.NET. He's currently finishing his degree at HIT while building Nextsoft and operating his US-based venture, Piro LLC.

His current focus is pushing the boundaries of AI and voice technology. He is developing a Shona speech-to-speech model and building TeleAgents, a voice agent platform designed for scale.

Outside of shipping code, he stays grounded. He studies Christian theology, runs to keep his mind sharp, and is currently learning to play the piano.

## Experience

- **Nextsoft** - Founder (2025 ~ Present)
- **TeleAgents** - Lead Developer (2026 ~ Present)
- **Piro LLC** - Founder (2025 ~ Present)
- **Harare Institute of Technology** - Software Engineering Student & AI Researcher (2022 ~ 2026)
- **Hackathons & Open Source (Dev0, Viber)** - Full-Stack Developer (Ongoing)

## Technical Stack

This website is built with:

- **Framework**: Next.js (React)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Content**: MDX for blog posts
- **Internationalization**: next-intl
- **Animations**: Framer Motion
- **Language**: TypeScript
